title: Dictionaries
mission_log: Map usernames to their password hints to unlock accounts.
challenge: Given users = {"neo": "redpill", "trinity": "matrix"}, print the hint for "neo".
starter_code:
# Access the password hint
users = {"neo": "redpill", "trinity": "matrix"}

# Print neo's hint
print()
hints: Dictionaries use keys to get values. Like: users["neo"] gets "redpill"
Remember to use quotes around the key: users["neo"]
